remarks.para: May be inoperative provided dispatch deviations for associated equipment are observed.

numlitem.para: Dispatch with inoperative (nuisance) Status level message(s) is allowed by provisions of this MEL item. An inoperative message is one which is displayed when there is no actual equipment fault. Dispatch may be accomplished by observing the Dispatch Deviation for the associated equipment.

placard.para: Placard "DISREGARD STATUS MESSAGE _____" below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
